SEARCH
Package lighthouse.util

Class TDMNode

java.lang.Object
lighthouse.util.ListNode
lighthouse.util.TDMNode
public class TDMNode extends ListNode
TDMNode is a node representing a node in the Term-Document Matrix. Extends ListNode and contains information regarding term count, weight, documentID where term is found.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • TDMNode

      public TDMNode(String documentID, int termCount)
      Constructs a TDMNode with the specified document ID and term count.
      Parameters:
      documentID - The id of the document associated with the node.
      termCount - The count for the frequency of occurence of this term in the document.
